name: libdotd_example
description: Boilerplate for use of qtools-library-dot-d - demonstrates dynamic module loading
author: TQ White II

dependencies._comment_qtools-library-dot-d: Core library for dynamic dotD module loading - provides qtLibDotD factory function

_instructions.usage: Run 'npm start' to see both synchronous and asynchronous dotD library demos
_instructions.creating_new_modules: Add .js files to the demoModules_DotD directory - they'll automatically become library methods
_instructions.shared_resources: Use passThroughParameters in index.js to share config, utilities, database connections, etc. across all modules
